text: Anne Rivers Siddons (January 9, 1936 â€“ September 11, 2019) was an American novelist. She was known for her stories set in the Southern United States. She was born in Fairburn, Georgia. Her best known books include: Peachtree Road, The House Next Door and Sweetwater Creek. Siddons died on September 11, 2019 in Charleston, South Carolina of lung cancer at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:American novelists Category:Writers from Atlanta Category:Writers from Charleston, South Carolina
title: Anne Rivers Siddons
